v.
Catherine P. Awakuni COLON, Acting Commissioner of Securities, Department of Commerce and Consumer Affairs, State of Hawai'i; State of Hawai'i, Department of Commerce and Consumer Affairs, Respondents-Appellees-Appellees NO. SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Affirmed.
